hero.title: QR Menu for Restaurant & Cafe | Digital Menu Website
hero.subtitle: Create professional QR menu for your restaurant or cafe in minutes. SobogdQR is the complete digital menu website solution with instant updates, multilingual support, and analytics. Perfect for restaurants and cafes.

intro.title: Transform Your Restaurant with Digital QR Menu
intro.description: Modern restaurants and cafes are choosing digital QR menus over traditional paper menus. With SobogdQR, you get a complete website for your restaurant that customers can access by scanning a QR code. Update your menu instantly - changes appear for customers in under 2 seconds. Serve international customers with automatic translation to 10+ languages, and understand what your customers love with detailed analytics. Whether you run a small cafe or a growing restaurant chain, our QR menu solution helps you provide a better dining experience while reducing printing costs by up to 70% and improving efficiency.

list.title: AI-Powered Automatic Menu Translation

list.description: Reach international customers with automatic menu translation powered by advanced AI. Your restaurant or cafe menu is instantly translated into 10+ languages including Spanish, French, German, Italian, Chinese, and Japanese in under 3 seconds, helping you serve tourists and international guests effortlessly. Studies show restaurants with multilingual menus increase sales by 23% on average.

list.title: Advanced Menu Analytics & Insights
list.shortDescription: Track customer behavior with real-time analytics - see which dishes get 90% more views
list.description: Understand what your customers love with detailed analytics for your QR menu. Track views, clicks, and cart additions for every dish in real-time with 99.9% accuracy. Our data shows restaurants using analytics increase revenue by 18% by optimizing their menu based on customer behavior. Identify your top-performing dishes within 48 hours of launch.

list.title: Smart Shopping Cart for Restaurants
list.shortDescription: Let customers build their order and see the total instantly - reduce order errors by 85%
list.description: Streamline your service with an intelligent shopping cart system. Customers can add items, see total prices instantly, and show their complete order to waiters. Restaurants report 85% reduction in order errors and 40% faster table turnover when using our smart cart system. Perfect for restaurants and cafes looking to improve order accuracy and speed up service.

list.title: Modern Design with Light & Dark Themes
list.shortDescription: Beautiful, professional design that works in any lighting - loads in under 1 second
list.description: Impress your customers with a sleek, modern menu design that loads in under 1 second on any device. Your QR menu automatically adapts to light and dark themes, ensuring perfect readability whether customers dine during the day or evening. Mobile-responsive design means 98% of customers can view your menu seamlessly on any smartphone or tablet.

instant-qr-menu-restaurant-website-gener.title: Instant QR Menu and Restaurant Website Generator
instant-qr-menu-restaurant-website-gener.description: Create your restaurant or cafe QR menu and website instantly. Generate printable QR codes with custom text and multiple layouts in minutes - no technical skills required.

meta.title: Instant QR Menu and Restaurant Website Generator | SobogdQR
meta.description: Generate QR menu and restaurant website instantly. Create custom QR codes for your cafe or restaurant in minutes with printable layouts for A4, A5, A6 paper formats. Free instant generator.

content.intro: SobogdQR now offers an instant QR menu and restaurant website generator that creates professional digital menus in minutes. Whether you run a cozy cafe or a busy restaurant, our instant generator lets you create, customize, and print QR codes that link directly to your digital menu website. No technical skills required, no waiting - just instant QR menu creation for restaurants and cafes of any size.
content.image1Alt: Instant QR menu generator for restaurant and cafe websites
content.image1Caption: Generate custom QR codes for your restaurant website instantly
content.section1Title: How the Instant QR Menu Generator Works
content.section1Text: Our instant QR menu and restaurant website generator creates everything you need in minutes. Simply add your menu items, and the system instantly generates a unique QR code linked to your restaurant website. The generator supports multiple paper formats (A4, A5, A6, Letter), various QR layouts per page (1 to 16 codes), and customizable text beneath each QR code. Preview exactly what you'll print, then download or print directly - your instant QR menu is ready to display at your tables.
content.section2Title: Customizable QR Codes for Any Restaurant or Cafe
content.section2Text: The instant QR menu generator offers complete customization for your restaurant or cafe branding. Add your restaurant name above the QR code, include custom text like 'Scan for Menu' or 'QR Menu' below, and choose from three text sizes. The generator produces clean, simple QR codes optimized for fast scanning. Whether you need a single large QR code for a poster or 16 smaller codes for individual table cards, our instant generator adapts to your restaurant's needs.
content.section3Text: Unlike complicated design tools, our instant QR menu generator creates print-ready layouts automatically. Select your paper format, choose how many QR codes per page, and hit print - that's it. The generator handles margins, spacing, and sizing to ensure perfect prints every time. For cafes and restaurants that need professional QR menus quickly, this instant approach saves hours of design work and gets your digital menu in front of customers faster.
content.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Instant QR Menu Generation
content.benefit1: Generate complete QR menu and restaurant website in minutes, not hours
content.benefit2: Multiple paper formats: A4, A5, A6, and Letter sizes supported
content.benefit3: Flexible layouts: from single large QR to 16 codes per page
content.benefit4: Custom text and sizing options for your restaurant branding
content.benefit5: Print-ready output with automatic margins and spacing
content.benefit6: Download as PNG or print directly from your browser
content.conclusionTitle: Start Using the Instant QR Menu Generator
content.conclusionText: With SobogdQR's instant QR menu and restaurant website generator, you can have a professional digital menu up and running in minutes. No design skills needed, no expensive software required - just instant generation of beautiful, scannable QR codes that connect customers to your menu. Perfect for new restaurants launching their first QR menu or established cafes updating their existing setup. Generate your instant QR menu today and modernize your dining experience.
content.ctaText: Ready to generate your instant QR menu?

public-restaurant-qr-menu-website.title: Public Restaurant Website for QR Menu Scanning
public-restaurant-qr-menu-website.description: Launch your public restaurant website with QR menu. Customers scan the code and instantly see your digital menu with categories, items, photos and prices.

meta.title: Public Restaurant Website for QR Menu Scanning | SobogdQR
meta.description: Create a public restaurant website for QR menu scanning. Customers scan the QR code and view your digital menu with categories, dishes, photos, and prices instantly.

content.intro: SobogdQR now offers a fully functional public restaurant website for QR menu scanning. Your customers can simply scan a QR code and instantly access your complete digital menu. The public website displays all your categories, menu items, photos, descriptions, and prices in a beautiful, mobile-optimized interface. This public restaurant website for QR scanning transforms how guests interact with your menu.
content.image1Alt: Public restaurant website showing QR menu categories
content.image1Caption: Mobile-friendly public restaurant website displaying menu categories for QR scanning
content.section1Title: How the Public Restaurant Website Works with QR Scanning
content.section1Text: When customers scan your restaurant's QR code, they're instantly taken to your public website displaying the complete menu. No app download required, no waiting - just immediate access to your offerings. The public restaurant website for QR menu shows categories at the top for easy navigation, with items displayed in an elegant card layout featuring photos, descriptions, and prices. Customers can tap on categories to filter items or scroll through the entire menu.
content.section2Title: Features of Your Public Restaurant QR Menu Website
content.section2Text: Your public restaurant website includes everything customers need: category tabs for quick navigation, high-quality dish photos, detailed descriptions, prices in your currency, and active item indicators. The design is optimized for mobile devices since most QR scans happen on phones. Items load quickly thanks to optimized images, and the interface is intuitive for guests of all ages. Changes made in your admin panel appear instantly on the public website.
content.image2Alt: Restaurant QR menu website showing food items with photos
content.image2Caption: Public menu website displaying dishes with optimized photos and descriptions
content.section3Text: The public restaurant website includes a language selector so international guests can view your menu in their preferred language. Currently supporting English and Spanish, with more languages coming soon. This makes your public restaurant QR menu accessible to tourists and diverse customer bases. The language preference is remembered for return visits, providing a personalized experience.
content.image3Alt: Language selection on public restaurant QR menu website
content.image3Caption: Language selector allowing guests to view the public menu in their preferred language
content.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Your Public Restaurant QR Menu Website
content.benefit1: Instant menu access - customers scan and view immediately, no app needed
content.benefit2: Mobile-optimized design for perfect display on any smartphone
content.benefit3: Real-time updates - menu changes appear instantly to customers
content.benefit4: Category navigation for easy browsing of your offerings
content.benefit6: Fast loading with optimized images and modern technology
content.conclusionTitle: Start Using Your Public Restaurant QR Menu Website
content.conclusionText: With SobogdQR's public restaurant website for QR menu scanning, you provide customers with instant access to your complete menu. Simply add your categories and items through the admin panel, generate your QR code, and display it at your tables. Customers scan and browse your beautiful digital menu in seconds. No more printing costs, no more outdated menus - just a modern dining experience.
content.ctaText: Ready to launch your public restaurant QR menu website?

add-items-restaurant-qr-menu-website.title: How to Add Items to Restaurant Website with QR Menu
add-items-restaurant-qr-menu-website.description: Complete guide on how to add items to your restaurant website with QR menu. Learn to add dishes with photos, prices, and descriptions to your digital menu in minutes.

meta.title: How to Add Items to Restaurant Website with QR Menu | SobogdQR
meta.description: Step-by-step guide on how to add items to restaurant website with QR menu. Add dishes, set prices, upload photos, and organize your digital menu. Easy item management for restaurants.

content.intro: Want to know how to add items to your restaurant website with QR menu? SobogdQR makes it incredibly easy to add and manage menu items on your digital restaurant website. Whether you're adding your first dish or updating your entire menu, our intuitive item management system helps you create a professional QR menu that showcases your cuisine perfectly. This guide shows you exactly how to add items to restaurant website with QR menu, including photos, prices, descriptions, and categories.
content.image1Alt: How to add items to restaurant website with QR menu - item list view
content.image1Caption: Item management interface showing how to add items to your restaurant QR menu website
content.section1Title: Why Adding Items Properly Matters for Your Restaurant QR Menu Website
content.section1Text: When you add items to restaurant website with QR menu, presentation is everything. Customers decide what to order based on how your dishes look and how well they're described. Our item management system lets you add beautiful photos, detailed descriptions, accurate prices, and organize items into categories. This is how to add items to restaurant website that converts browsers into customers. Research shows that menus with high-quality images increase orders by up to 30%.
content.section2Title: Step-by-Step: How to Add Items to Restaurant Website with QR Menu
content.section2Text: Adding items to your restaurant website with QR menu is simple with SobogdQR. Navigate to the Items section in your dashboard and click the add button. Enter the item name, write an appetizing description, set the price, and select a category. Upload a photo of your dish - our system automatically optimizes images to 500x500 pixels for perfect display. Toggle the active status to show or hide items instantly. This streamlined process makes it easy to add items to restaurant website with QR menu in just minutes.
content.image2Alt: Item form showing how to add items to restaurant QR menu website
content.image2Caption: Simple form interface for adding items to your restaurant website with QR menu
content.section3Title: Image Upload and Optimization for Your Restaurant Items
content.section3Text: High-quality images are essential when you add items to restaurant website with QR menu. Our system accepts JPEG, PNG, WebP, and GIF formats up to 5MB. Every image is automatically resized to 500x500 pixels and converted to WebP format for fast loading while maintaining excellent quality. This means your dishes always look their best on any device. Professional food photography significantly improves how customers perceive your restaurant when browsing your QR menu website.
content.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Adding Items to Your Restaurant QR Menu Website
content.benefit1: Add unlimited menu items with photos, descriptions, and prices
content.benefit2: Automatic image optimization for fast loading and perfect display
content.benefit3: Organize items into categories for easy customer navigation
content.benefit4: Active/inactive toggle to hide sold-out items without deleting
content.benefit5: Drag and drop reordering to arrange items in your preferred order
content.benefit6: Mobile-friendly interface to add items from any device
content.conclusionTitle: Start Adding Items to Your Restaurant QR Menu Website Today
content.conclusionText: Now you know exactly how to add items to restaurant website with QR menu using SobogdQR. Our powerful item management system provides everything you need to create a mouth-watering digital menu. Add beautiful photos, write compelling descriptions, set competitive prices, and organize your items into logical categories. Whether you run a small cafe or a large restaurant, SobogdQR makes it easy to add items to restaurant website that attracts and converts customers.
content.ctaText: Ready to add items to your restaurant website with QR menu?

content.intro: Want to know how to make QR code menu for restaurant with categories? SobogdQR now offers a powerful category management system that makes creating organized digital menus easier than ever. Whether you're running a restaurant, cafe, or bar, organizing your menu with categories helps customers find exactly what they're looking for. content.image1Alt: How to make QR code menu for restaurant - categories list view
content.image1Caption: Category management interface showing how to organize your restaurant QR menu
content.section1Title: Why Categories Matter When You Make QR Code Menu for Restaurant
content.section1Text: When you make QR code menu for restaurant, organizing items into categories is essential. Customers expect to see logical groupings like Appetizers, Main Courses, Desserts, and Beverages. Our new category management system lets you create unlimited categories, set their display order, and toggle their visibility. This is exactly how to make QR code menu for restaurant that customers love - clear, organized, and easy to navigate. Studies show restaurants with well-organized digital menus see 35% higher customer satisfaction.
content.section2Title: Step-by-Step: How to Make QR Code Menu for Restaurant with Categories
content.section2Text: Making a QR code menu for restaurant with categories is simple with SobogdQR. First, navigate to the Categories section in your dashboard. Click the floating action button to add a new category. Enter the category name, optional description, and set whether it's active. The new streamlined interface shows all your categories in a clean list with activity indicators. Use the up and down arrows to reorder categories exactly how you want them to appear on your QR menu. This intuitive approach to making QR code menu for restaurant ensures your menu is always organized perfectly.
content.image2Alt: Category form showing how to make QR code menu for restaurant
content.image2Caption: Simple form interface for creating restaurant menu categories
content.section3Text: We know restaurant owners are busy and often manage their menus on the go. That's why our category management is fully optimized for mobile devices. When you make QR code menu for restaurant using your phone, you'll find a compact interface with a three-dot menu for quick actions. Move categories up or down, edit details, or delete categories - all from your smartphone. This mobile-first approach ensures you can make QR code menu for restaurant with categories anytime, anywhere.

content.benefit1: Organize menu items logically so customers can easily find what they want
content.benefit2: Drag and drop reordering to arrange categories in your preferred display order
content.benefit3: Active/inactive toggle to hide seasonal categories without deleting them
content.benefit4: Mobile-optimized interface to manage categories from any device
content.benefit5: Clean visual design with activity indicators for quick status overview
content.benefit6: Unlimited categories to fully represent your restaurant's menu structure
content.conclusionTitle: Start Making Your QR Code Menu with Categories Today
content.conclusionText: Now you know exactly how to make QR code menu for restaurant with categories using SobogdQR. Our new category management system provides everything you need to create a professional, well-organized digital menu. Categories help customers navigate your menu faster, find their favorite dishes, and discover new items. Whether you have a simple menu with a few categories or an extensive menu with dozens of sections, SobogdQR makes it easy to make QR code menu for restaurant that impresses your customers.

meta.description: Create QR menu for your cafe easily with our new control panel. Modern sidebar interface for managing categories, products, QR codes, and analytics. Easy cafe menu creation.

content.intro: We're excited to introduce our brand new admin control panel designed to make creating QR menus for your cafe as easy as possible. Whether you're running a small coffee shop or a bustling cafe, our easy-to-use interface helps you manage your digital menu effortlessly. The new control panel features a modern sidebar design that puts all the tools you need to create your cafe's QR menu right at your fingertips.
content.image1Alt: Easy QR menu control panel for cafe management
content.image1Caption: New control panel with sidebar navigation for easy cafe QR menu creation
content.section1Title: Modern Sidebar Interface for Easy Menu Management
content.section1Text: The new control panel features a sleek sidebar that makes navigating your cafe's QR menu settings incredibly easy. With clearly organized sections for Dashboard, Categories, Products, QR Code, Analytics, Settings, Billing, and Support, you can easily find and manage every aspect of your cafe's digital menu. The sidebar collapses on mobile devices, ensuring easy access to all features regardless of what device you're using to manage your cafe's QR menu.
content.section2Title: Easy Category and Product Management for Your Cafe
content.section2Text: Creating and organizing your cafe's QR menu has never been easier. Our new category and product management pages are designed with simplicity in mind, allowing cafe owners to easily add, edit, and organize their menu items. Whether you're updating daily specials or adding seasonal drinks, the easy-to-use interface ensures your cafe's QR menu stays current and appealing to customers.
content.section3Text: The new control panel is built with server-side rendering (SSR) technology, ensuring your cafe's QR menu management dashboard loads quickly and efficiently. All data is fetched from the server, providing real-time updates and a smooth experience. This easy and fast approach means you spend less time waiting and more time perfecting your cafe's QR menu.

content.benefit4: Easy QR code generation and customization for your cafe

content.benefit6: Easy mobile access - manage your cafe's QR menu from any device

content.conclusionText: Our new control panel represents a major step forward in making QR menu creation easy for cafe owners everywhere. With its intuitive sidebar interface, fast server-side rendering, and comprehensive management tools, creating and maintaining your cafe's digital QR menu has never been easier. Join thousands of cafes already using SobogdQR to provide their customers with an easy, modern menu experience.

free-restaurant-website-improvements.title: Free Restaurant Website Creation - Mobile Optimization & UX Improvements
free-restaurant-website-improvements.description: Major improvements to creating a free restaurant website: optimized mobile navigation with hamburger menu, enhanced signup page for better conversions, and streamlined user experience.

meta.title: Free Restaurant Website Creation Updates - SobogdQR Changelog
meta.description: Learn how SobogdQR improved the free restaurant website creation process with mobile-optimized navigation, better signup flow, and enhanced user experience for cafes and restaurants

content.intro: Creating a free restaurant website has never been easier or more mobile-friendly. We've made significant improvements to help restaurant and cafe owners build their professional website with a digital QR menu, especially on mobile devices where most people search for 'создание сайта для ресторана бесплатно' (free restaurant website creation). These updates focus on mobile navigation, signup page refinements, and overall user experience to ensure anyone can create a restaurant website for free without any technical knowledge.
content.image1Alt: Mobile-optimized hamburger menu for restaurant website
content.image1Caption: New mobile navigation with hamburger menu for easy access to all features
content.section1Text: Most restaurant owners search for and create their free restaurant website on mobile devices. That's why we've completely redesigned our mobile navigation with a professional hamburger menu. On smartphones and tablets, the navigation now opens as a clean modal dialog, displaying all menu items (Pricing, Features, Changelog, Contacts) and the Get Started button in an easy-to-read vertical layout. This mobile-optimized approach makes it simple to explore SobogdQR's features and start creating your free restaurant website right from your phone. The theme and language selectors remain easily accessible in the header, while the hamburger menu keeps the interface clean and uncluttered.
content.section2Title: Enhanced Get Started Page for Free Restaurant Website Creation
content.section2Text: We've refined the signup page to make creating a free restaurant website even more intuitive. The improvements include better spacing on mobile devices, centered value proposition cards that clearly explain benefits, and optimized form layouts that work perfectly on small screens. The restaurant counter showing how many businesses already use SobogdQR now displays full-width on mobile, providing strong social proof that encourages new restaurant owners to start their free website. Every element has been carefully tested to ensure that creating your restaurant website is smooth and fast, whether you're on a desktop computer or your smartphone.
content.image2Alt: Optimized signup flow for free restaurant website creation
content.image2Caption: Streamlined signup process optimized for mobile devices
content.section3Title: Three-Step Process Optimized for All Devices
content.section3Text: The visual process indicator showing the three simple steps to create your free restaurant website (Sign up with your email, Add your menu items, Get your QR code & start) now adapts beautifully to different screen sizes. On mobile and tablets, the steps display vertically with clear spacing, making it easy to understand the simple process. On larger screens, they show horizontally with arrows. This adaptive design ensures that everyone, regardless of their device, can clearly see how quick and easy it is to create a professional restaurant website for free with SobogdQR.
content.benefitsTitle: Key Improvements for Creating Free Restaurant Websites
content.benefit1: Mobile-optimized hamburger menu navigation for easy access on smartphones
content.benefit2: Enhanced signup page with better mobile spacing and centered layouts
content.benefit3: Full-width restaurant counter on mobile providing strong social proof
content.benefit4: Adaptive three-step process indicator that works on all screen sizes
content.benefit5: Streamlined input forms optimized for mobile touch interaction
content.benefit6: Fixed logout redirect issue ensuring proper navigation across all pages
content.conclusionTitle: Free Restaurant Website Creation Made Simple
content.conclusionText: These improvements reinforce our commitment to making free restaurant website creation accessible to everyone. Whether you're a small cafe owner checking out SobogdQR on your phone during a break, or a restaurant manager planning your digital strategy on a tablet, the experience is now seamless and professional. You can create a complete restaurant website with QR menu, absolutely free, in just a few minutes from any device. No credit card required, no technical skills needed - just your menu and a few minutes of time to build your professional online presence.
content.ctaText: Ready to create your free restaurant website?

landing-redesign.title: Redesigned Get Started Page for Higher Conversions
landing-redesign.description: We've completely redesigned our signup page with a focus on conversion optimization, featuring value propositions, social proof, and a streamlined user experience.

meta.title: Get Started Page Redesign - SobogdQR Changelog
meta.description: SobogdQR launches redesigned signup page with improved UX, social proof counter, and conversion-focused design for restaurant QR menu creation

content.intro: We're excited to announce a complete redesign of our Get Started page, built specifically to help restaurant and cafe owners create their digital QR menu faster than ever. This update focuses on clearly communicating value, building trust through social proof, and providing a seamless signup experience that takes less than 5 minutes from start to finish.
content.image1Alt: New SobogdQR get started page with value propositions and social proof
content.image1Caption: Redesigned signup page with clear value propositions and restaurant counter
content.section1Title: Clear Value Propositions at a Glance
content.section1Text: The new design prominently displays four key benefits that restaurant owners care about most: no technical skills required, instant menu updates, QR code and website included, and free to start. Each benefit is presented in a clean card format with intuitive icons, making it immediately clear what SobogdQR offers. This approach helps busy restaurant owners understand the value proposition within seconds of landing on the page.
content.section2Text: We've added a dynamic restaurant counter that shows how many businesses are already using SobogdQR. This counter updates automatically based on our growth rate, providing authentic social proof that helps new visitors feel confident in their decision to try our platform. Seeing that over 1,400 restaurants already trust SobogdQR significantly reduces hesitation and encourages signups.
content.section3Text: The entire signup process now happens on a single page with a consistent layout. Whether entering your email or verifying your code, the design remains the same - only the input field changes. This creates a smoother, less jarring experience. We've also added a visual process indicator showing the three simple steps: Sign up, Add menu, and Get QR. This transparency helps users understand exactly what to expect and reduces abandonment.
content.benefit1: Value proposition cards with icons for instant comprehension
content.benefit2: Live restaurant counter providing authentic social proof
content.benefit3: Unified page design for both email and OTP verification steps
content.benefit5: Conversion-focused copy: 'Create Your Digital Menu in 5 Minutes'
content.benefit6: Real-time email validation with visual feedback
content.conclusionText: Every element of this redesign was crafted with restaurant and cafe owners in mind. We understand that you're busy running your business, so we've made the signup process as quick and reassuring as possible. The new page clearly shows what you'll get, how easy it is to get started, and that thousands of other restaurants have already made the same choice. Whether you're a small cafe or a growing restaurant chain, you can now create your professional QR menu website in just 5 minutes.
content.ctaText: Ready to create your restaurant's digital menu?

auth.title: New User Authentication Interface
auth.description: We've launched a simple and secure email-based authentication system that lets you create your restaurant website and QR menu in minutes.

meta.title: User Authentication Interface - SobogdQR Changelog
meta.description: SobogdQR introduces a new passwordless authentication system for creating your restaurant website and digital QR menu quickly and securely

content.intro: We are excited to announce the launch of our new user authentication interface for SobogdQR. This update represents a significant step forward in making it easier than ever to create your restaurant website with a professional QR menu. Our goal has always been to help restaurant and cafe owners build their digital presence in minutes, not hours, and this new authentication system is designed with that mission in mind.
content.image1Alt: Email input step of SobogdQR authentication
content.image1Caption: Simple email-based authentication - no passwords to remember
content.section1Text: Understanding that restaurant owners are busy people, we've implemented a passwordless authentication system that requires only your email address. When you want to create your restaurant website or update your digital QR menu, simply enter your email and receive a secure 4-digit verification code. This approach eliminates the frustration of forgotten passwords while maintaining the highest security standards for your restaurant's data. The entire process takes less than 30 seconds, allowing you to focus on what matters most - running your restaurant and serving your customers.
content.section2Text: With our new authentication system, getting started with your digital QR menu has never been easier. Once authenticated, you'll have immediate access to our intuitive menu builder where you can add your dishes, set prices, upload photos, and organize categories. The QR menu you create will be accessible to your customers instantly - they simply scan the code and view your beautifully designed digital menu on their smartphone. No app downloads required for your customers, and no technical knowledge required from you. This is exactly what modern restaurants and cafes need to compete in today's digital-first world.
content.image2Alt: OTP verification step of SobogdQR authentication
content.image2Caption: Secure 4-digit code verification sent directly to your email
content.section3Text: Security was our top priority when designing this authentication system. Each verification code expires after 10 minutes and can only be used once, protecting your restaurant website and menu data from unauthorized access. At the same time, we've optimized every step of the process for speed. From entering your email to accessing your dashboard, the entire authentication flow completes in under a minute. This means you can make quick updates to your QR menu during service, add daily specials, or adjust prices - all without any delays.
content.benefit1: Create your restaurant website with QR menu in minutes - no technical skills required
content.benefit2: No passwords to remember - secure email-based verification keeps your account safe
content.benefit3: Instant access to your digital menu builder from any device
content.benefit4: Quick updates to your QR menu even during busy service hours
content.conclusionTitle: Start Building Your Digital Menu Today
content.conclusionText: This new authentication interface is just the beginning of our commitment to making digital QR menus accessible to every restaurant and cafe. Whether you're a small coffee shop or a growing restaurant chain, SobogdQR provides the tools you need to create a professional online presence. Your customers expect to find your menu online, and with our solution, you can exceed those expectations with a beautifully designed, always up-to-date digital QR menu that works perfectly on any smartphone.
content.ctaText: Ready to create your restaurant website with QR menu?

subscription-plans-qr-menu-restaurant-we.title: Subscription Plans for QR Menu and Restaurant Website Creation
subscription-plans-qr-menu-restaurant-we.description: Introducing flexible subscription plans for creating your restaurant website and QR menu. Choose from Free, Basic, and Pro plans with monthly or yearly billing options.

meta.title: Subscription Plans for QR Menu and Restaurant Website | SobogdQR
meta.description: Choose the perfect subscription plan for your restaurant website and QR menu creation. Free, Basic, and Pro plans with flexible monthly and yearly billing. Start free today.

content.intro: We're excited to announce the launch of our new subscription system for QR menu and restaurant website creation. SobogdQR now offers flexible plans that grow with your business - from a completely free tier for small cafes to professional plans for established restaurants. Whether you're just starting out or managing multiple locations, our subscription plans provide the features you need to create and maintain a professional restaurant website with QR menu capabilities.
content.image1Alt: Subscription plans for QR menu and restaurant website creation
content.image1Caption: Choose the perfect plan for your restaurant website and QR menu needs
content.section1Title: Flexible Plans for Every Restaurant Size
content.section1Text: Our subscription system for QR menu and restaurant website creation offers three tiers designed to match your needs. The Free plan lets you get started with up to 15 menu items - perfect for small cafes or trying out the platform. The Basic plan at €4/month (or €3/month billed yearly) expands your capacity to 100 items with 3 languages and 2,000 monthly scans. For growing restaurants, our Pro plan at €7/month (or €6/month yearly) offers unlimited items, languages, and scans - everything you need for professional restaurant website and QR menu management.
content.section2Text: Managing your subscription for QR menu and restaurant website services is now easier than ever. Our new billing dashboard displays all available plans in a clean, simple interface. You can see your current plan at a glance, compare features, and upgrade or downgrade with a single click. The streamlined design shows each plan with its monthly price, making it easy to choose the right option for your restaurant website and QR menu needs. Secure payments are processed through Stripe, the industry standard for online transactions.
content.section3Text: Restaurant owners who commit to yearly billing for their QR menu and website subscription save 25% compared to monthly payments. The Basic plan drops from €4 to €3 per month, while the Pro plan goes from €7 to €6 per month when billed annually. This significant savings helps restaurants invest more in their core business while maintaining a professional digital presence. Switch between monthly and yearly billing anytime through your dashboard.
content.benefit1: Free plan available forever - no credit card required to start
content.benefit2: Flexible monthly or yearly billing with 25% savings on annual plans
content.benefit3: Instant plan upgrades - new features activate immediately
content.benefit4: Secure Stripe payment processing for all transactions
content.benefit5: Easy plan management through simple billing dashboard
content.benefit6: Downgrade anytime - no long-term contracts required
content.conclusionTitle: Start Creating Your Restaurant Website Today
content.conclusionText: With our new subscription plans, creating a professional QR menu and restaurant website has never been more accessible. Start with our Free plan to experience the platform, then upgrade as your restaurant grows. Our flexible billing options, transparent pricing, and instant activation mean you can have your digital menu up and running in minutes. Join thousands of restaurants already using SobogdQR to connect with their customers through modern, mobile-friendly QR menus.
content.ctaText: Ready to choose your plan for QR menu and restaurant website?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About QR Menu for Restaurant & Cafe
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about creating and managing your digital QR menu for restaurants and cafes

howto.question: How to create a QR menu for your restaurant in 4 easy steps?
howto.answer: Start serving customers with a digital menu in minutes - no technical skills required
howto.faqDescription: Check out our comprehensive FAQ to learn everything about creating and managing your restaurant's QR menu

steps.name: Sign up for free
steps.text: Create your free SobogdQR account in under 2 minutes - no credit card required

steps.name: Add your menu items
steps.text: Upload your dishes with photos, descriptions, and prices through our intuitive interface

steps.name: Customize your design
steps.text: Choose from light or dark themes and customize colors to match your restaurant brand

steps.name: Generate your QR code
steps.text: Download your high-quality QR code that updates automatically whenever you change your menu

steps.name: Print and display
steps.text: Print your QR code and place it on tables, at the entrance, or on takeout counters - customers can scan and view instantly

questions.question: What is a QR menu for restaurant and how does it work?
questions.answer: A QR menu for restaurant is a digital menu that customers can access by scanning a QR code with their smartphone. SobogdQR creates a professional digital menu website for your restaurant or cafe that updates instantly without reprinting. Customers simply scan the code and view your menu on their device.

questions.question: How much does a QR menu cost for a restaurant or cafe?
questions.answer: SobogdQR offers flexible pricing starting from €0 forever with our free plan. This makes it affordable for any restaurant or cafe to create a professional QR menu. Paid plans start at just €4/month with additional features like unlimited items and advanced analytics.

questions.question: Can I create a website for my restaurant without coding?
questions.answer: Yes! SobogdQR is designed for restaurant and cafe owners without any technical knowledge. You can create a complete digital menu website for your restaurant in minutes, no programming or coding skills required. Simply add your dishes, prices, and photos through our intuitive interface.

questions.question: How often can I update my QR menu?
questions.answer: You can update your restaurant or cafe menu as often as you need. All changes are reflected in real-time, allowing you to instantly update prices, add new dishes, or change descriptions without reprinting physical menus. Perfect for daily specials and seasonal updates.

questions.question: Does the QR menu work for both restaurants and cafes?
questions.answer: Absolutely! SobogdQR is perfect for restaurants, cafes, coffee shops, bars, food trucks, and any food service business. Our digital menu solution adapts to any type of establishment, from small cafes to large restaurant chains.

questions.question: How does the automatic menu translation work?
questions.answer: Our QR menu system uses artificial intelligence to translate your restaurant or cafe menu into multiple languages automatically. This is perfect for tourist areas and international customers. You can offer your menu in English, Spanish, and other languages, helping you serve more customers.

questions.question: Can I try the QR menu solution for free?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a completely free plan for restaurants and cafes to try SobogdQR. You can create your digital menu website with up to 15 items at no cost, forever. No credit card required to start. Upgrade only when you need more features.

questions.question: Is SobogdQR an app that customers need to download?
questions.answer: No! This is one of the best advantages. Customers don't need to download any app. They simply scan your QR code and the menu opens instantly in their web browser. This makes it much more convenient than restaurant apps that require downloads.

questions.question: What are the benefits of a digital menu website for my restaurant?
questions.answer: A digital menu website offers many benefits: instant menu updates without reprinting costs, multilingual support for international customers, contactless ordering for safety, analytics to see popular dishes, and professional presentation. Plus, it's eco-friendly as you eliminate paper menu waste.

questions.question: How do I create a QR code for my restaurant menu?
questions.answer: SobogdQR automatically generates a professional QR code when you create your digital menu. You can download and print this QR code for your restaurant tables, entrance, or takeout counter. The QR code is customizable and high-quality for clear scanning.
